name: possystem
description: The objective of this POS System is to automate the process of making sales, managing stock of any business with a product or service. It manages the sales, stock and sales of any business with a product or service and a point of sale. It keeps track of all the purchases, sales, expresses and user activity made during a given period and the inventory of the items.

scripts.test: hanged to sql or mysql if customization is requested. All the fields on the form take valid values and error handling is done at the front end itself.

author: Micheal Sakwa
